name: Foxy Bitch
description:
Welp. Originally made for LD46, but was not finished in time. And supposed to have a handful of other very simple aspects, but this is my 2nd ever game made in Unity and I'm learning how NOT to break shit--- so this is the final version unless folks end up really liking it. Let me know what you think!

GOAL

  • Get as many people dancing at once and keep them there for as long as possible. You only start getting points once you hit the string section of the song. 
  • Get people all coked out to keep them at the club, or else they get tired and go home :(

do that by...

  1. Letting people into the disco first
  2. Serving them drinks to loosen them up for dancing
  3. Feed them the yeyo to keep them in the club or else they just go home!
  4. Revive KO'd people with the revival needle

CONTROLS

  • Mouse to look
  • WASD or arrows to move
  • 1 to equip yeyo
  • 2 to equip revive needle
  • Left click to let people in the club or tell them to go back to the bar
  • Left click with cocaine in hand to give it to someone
  • Left click with revive needle to bring someone back to life
  • Right click with cocaine to get a boost

Pink score is highscore

Green is current score

directed and programmed by

Stephen Scott Day

original soundtrack by

Sonny Wong

https://soundcloud.com/sun_son

sound FX by

Cameron Combe

Special thanks to Brokn from the Playmaker Discord!
